Name: Battle Imagine - Great Warhog
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade Great Warhog's Battle Imagine skill: Stunt! Lightning Orb.

Stunt! Lightning Orb
Summon Elite: Great Warhog to release a Lightning Orb forward, dealing Attack Damage.
Upon the skill cast, your Light Bonus is increased for a period.
Description$english:
Use to activate or upgrade Great Warhog's Battle Imagine skill: Stunt! Lightning Orb.

Stunt! Lightning Orb

Description2$english: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
